ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lev 51 Selos got me killed!
ygData.msgSnippet: It does drop as soon as you re hit with melee damage.  Don t know if it does the same with spell damage or not. Elwyn  52 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr ...
ygData.messageBody:
It does drop as soon as you're hit with melee damage. Don't know if it does
the same with spell damage or not.


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
52 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 1:41 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lev 51 Selos got me killed!


ok, so do we know if the rune effect of nillipus' march is melee or spell
damage (or either), and whether it does in fact drop as soon as the damage
surpasses the rune, one hit in the case of most mobs? i haven't even tried
it since the 55 bard friend of mine said when he got it that it dropped as
soon as you were hit.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
